subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Raymonds succeeded Al McGuire as coach of the Marquette basketball team and led it to five N.C.A.A. tournament appearances in six seasons.
snippet: Raymonds succeeded Al McGuire as coach of the Marquette basketball team and led it to five N.C.A.A. tournament appearances in six seasons.
